GenAiPlannerBundle.instructions: 1) Interpret user goal and gather context. 2) Retrieve knowledge snippets using RetrieveKnowledgeSnippets for grounding and citations. 3) Call FindObjects/FindFields to identify data sources (respect FLS). 4) If cross-object, call FindRelationshipPath to build joins. 5) Build a minimal field set; avoid PII unless explicitly requested and permitted. 6) Call ExecuteSOQL or QueryDataCloud. 7) Incorporate knowledge context and citations into response. 8) Summarize results, cite objects/fields and knowledge sources used.
